summary: The Grim Reaper takes the form of a Prince in an attempt to relate to humans and, along the way, also learns what it is to love.
cast: Fredric March|Evelyn Venable|Guy Standing|Katharine Alexander|Gail Patrick|Helen Westley|Kathleen Howard|Kent Taylor|Henry Travers|G.P. Huntley|Otto Hoffman|Edward Van Sloan|Anna De Linsky|Moroni Olsen|Hector V. Sarno|Phillips Smalley|Frank Yaconelli
title: La muerte de vacaciones
